content: * amigurumi means knitted or crocheted doll in japanese in the picture shelly is the doll on the left bryan is the doll on the right lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60680 corrections applied mar 14 2012 skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 3 colors 1 ball each a b c plus d tiffanytm article #260 *discontinued* 137 yards *shown in fisherman cocoa avocado tiffany camel* *materials are sufficient to make several dolls * crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers polyester fiberfill 2 black buttons 9 mm diameter or scrap of black felt brown embroidery floss and embroidery needle powdered blush cotton swab sewing needle and thread pieces doll body hat scarf pants and sweater are worked as part of the body some construction required to finish see also 60658 amigurumi shelly girl doll 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-shelly-girl-doll
